articles.title: Lawsuits, executive actions, confirmations and golf trips: Key moments in Trump’s first 100 days - CNN
articles.description: Trump’s rat-a-tat executive orders and flood-the-zone approach to major policy proposals have overwhelmed Americans’ attention spans. Here’s a look at Trump’s first 100 days by the numbers:
articles.content: Ever since the government-changing administration of Franklin D. Roosevelt, a presidents first 100 days in office have been viewed as a sprint to see how much they can get done in the honeymoon perio… [+8404 chars]

articles.title: Exclusive: Most Americans see Trump as "dangerous dictator," poll says - Axios
articles.description: It's the latest sign of the president losing support for his immigration and economic policies — issues that largely fueled his election.
articles.content: A majority of Americans say President Trump is a "dangerous dictator" who poses a threat to democracy and believe he's overstepped his authority by actions such as the mass firing of federal employee… [+3846 chars]
